description: Discover the essential concepts and information on investing in real-estate property, and how you can start earning yourself a sustainable income. This educational course introduces the essential concepts and information on investing in property. Providing an overview of the types of property, particularly in Australia. Also where and when to invest, financing, types of deals to look for, and opportunities for growing wealth. This course is aimed at those who want to start out in property investment, either part-time, or as a full time strategy. Although those already in the know-how might also benefit from the reinforcement of baseline knowledge. Instead of reading hundreds of books, this course will fast-track your knowledge with short bursts of information, at your own pace, whenever you want. Easy asâ€¦
title: Beginners Guide to Real Estate Property Investing
